import React ,{Component} from 'react' import moment from "moment"; import fire from '../firebase' import { Button, Container, Card, Header, Image, Grid, Loader, Icon, Dimmer, Divider, Form , Comment, GridColumn } from "semantic-ui-react"; var qs = require('querystringify'); class ShowPost extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { key1:"" , key2:"" , loading :true, }; this.back = this.back.bind(this); } back = () => { this.props.history.push("/"); } render() { return
{this.state.loading ? Loading :
this.state.details.title
this.state.details.user Posted , this.state.details.timestamp this.state.details.title this.state.details.description this.state.details.score Fires }
} } export default ShowPost;
